plugin.name: extra-security-context-v1
plugin._long: An implementation of the wlr-security-context-v1 protocol.

option.name: blacklist_mode
option._long: `initial`(default)`, apply the initial wayfire's blacklist then add custom rules if needed. `reset`, use only the custom rules.

option.name: blacklist
option._long: The blacklist to be applied to all applications.

entry._long: Define a protocol to be blacklisted.

option.name: denylist
option._long: The deny list of protocols to be applied to a specific application.

entry._long: Define a protocol to be denied.

option.name: allowlist
option._long: The allow list of protocols to be applied to a specific application.

entry._long: Define a protocol to be allowed.

option.name: applications
option._long: The list of applications to manage.

entry._short: set the blacklist mode for this application.
entry._long: `inherit`(default)`, inherit from the parent black list and apply the deny / allow list. `initial`, apply the initial wayfire's black list then apply the deny/allow list. `reset`, use only the deny / allow list.
